title: Why these internet activists are fighting to save Yahoo Groups
text:
Every civilisation has its origin stories, its creation myths and its doomsday predictions. For Yahoo Groups, an early internet culture, the end has been predicted almost since the beginning.

“Almost since I first started using Yahoo Groups in 2003, people were telling me the service won’t last and it will be shut down in a year or so,” says Shal Farley, 63, an engineer from California and long a guru of sorts for Yahoo Group moderators.

Each new bug, the rise of Facebook, a new format introduced in 2013 that was poorly received by users - to loyalists, all of these have heralded the end.

“There’s always been these reasons people come up to us and say ‘yeah they’re going to turn off Yahoo...
description: Every civilisation has its origin stories, its creation myths and its doomsday predictions.
